comment: Wrapper for outputting an index.htm for multiple BaliTestSuites
constructorsignature: Function New(title As String) As BaliTestRunner
commenthtml: Wrapper for outputting an index.htm for multiple BaliTestSuites

methods.label: New
methods.signature: Function New(title As String) As BaliTestRunner

methods.label: addTestSuite
methods.comment: Adds a BaliTestSuite to this BaliTestRunner
methods.codesample:
Dim testRunner as New BaliTestRunner(&quot;Tests&quot;)
Dim testSuite as New BaliTestSuite(&quot;Tests1&quot;)
Call testRunner.addTestSuite(testSuite)
methods.codesamplehtml: Dim testRunner as New BaliTestRunner(&quot;Tests&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;Dim testSuite as New BaliTestSuite(&quot;Tests1&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;Call testRunner.addTestSuite(testSuite)
methods.commenthtml: Adds a BaliTestSuite to this BaliTestRunner

arguments.label: testSuite
arguments.comment: BaliTestSuite to add to this BaliTestRunner

methods.label: createTestSuite
methods.comment: Creates a new BaliTestSuite with a label and adds it to this BaliTestRunner
methods.codesample:
Dim testRunner as New BaliTestRunner(&quot;Tests&quot;)
Dim currentSuite as BaliTestSuite
Set currentSuite = testRunner.createTestSuite(&quot;Tests1&quot;)
methods.signature: Function createTestSuite(title As String) As BaliTestSuite
methods.codesamplehtml: Dim testRunner as New BaliTestRunner(&quot;Tests&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;Dim currentSuite as BaliTestSuite&lt;br /&gt;Set currentSuite = testRunner.createTestSuite(&quot;Tests1&quot;)
methods.commenthtml: Creates a new BaliTestSuite with a label and adds it to this BaliTestRunner

methods.label: Delete
methods.comment: Destructor. Prints out reports and erases test suites List.
methods.commenthtml: Destructor. Prints out reports and erases test suites List.

methods.label: getFilePath
methods.comment: Gets the directory to save the HTML / XML output to.
methods.codesample:
Dim testRunner as New BaliTestRunner(&quot;Tests&quot;)
Print &quot;Tests will be written to &quot; & testRunner.getFilePath()) & &quot; as &quot; & testRunner.getOutputFormat()
methods.codesamplehtml: Dim testRunner as New BaliTestRunner(&quot;Tests&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;Print &quot;Tests will be written to &quot; & testRunner.getFilePath()) & &quot; as &quot; & testRunner.getOutputFormat()
methods.commenthtml: Gets the directory to save the HTML / XML output to.

methods.label: getOutputFormat
methods.comment: Getter for the output format, default is HTML.
methods.codesample:
Dim testRunner as New BaliTestRunner(&quot;Tests&quot;)
Print &quot;Tests will be written to &quot; & testRunner.getFilePath()) & &quot; as &quot; & testRunner.getOutputFormat()
methods.codesamplehtml: Dim testRunner as New BaliTestRunner(&quot;Tests&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;Print &quot;Tests will be written to &quot; & testRunner.getFilePath()) & &quot; as &quot; & testRunner.getOutputFormat()
methods.commenthtml: Getter for the output format, default is HTML.

methods.label: outputTo
methods.comment: Sets a directory to write reports to.
methods.codesample:
Dim testRunner as New BaliTestRunner(&quot;Tests&quot;)
Call testRunner.outputTo(&quot;unit-tests/&quot;)
methods.signature: Function outputTo(outputLoc As String) As BaliTestRunner
methods.commenthtml: Sets a directory to write reports to.

methods.label: setOutputFormat
methods.comment: Sets the output format for the reports
methods.codesample:
Dim testRunner as New BaliTestRunner(&quot;Tests&quot;)
Call testRunner.setOutputFormat(&quot;BOTH&quot;)
methods.signature: Function setOutputFormat(formatType As String) As BaliTestRunner
methods.commenthtml: Sets the output format for the reports
